name: Dek zwabber
description:
Pete is a sailor on Pirate Polly d'Plank's ship and must ensure that the ship shines at all times and at all costs. While swabbing the ship, Pete encounters several obstacles, including the trapdoors, sharks, treasure chests, and a twisted parrot.

Can you help Pete clean the deck and collect all the treasures?

---

Roadmap:

- More levels

- Infinity mode

- Something to spend your hard earned doubloons on!

- Several bug fixes

- Input from you guys <3
